headline: 2 Big Energy IPOs Flopped This Year. It Doesn’t Bode Well for 2026.
summary: Both face major challenges in 2026 that make a stock rebound far from certain.  The stocks’ wipeouts are particularly notable because both companies tapped into themes that seemed unstoppable.  Fermi has pledged to build the largest data center campus in the world, powered by natural gas, solar panels, batteries, and nuclear energy.

headline: 45% of Alphabet’s $3 Billion Hidden Portfolio Is in Just 2 White-Hot Stocks
summary: Alphabet (NASDAQ:GOOG)(NASDAQ:GOOGL) dominates the search engine market with over 90% share and powers billions of daily queries through Google Search. Its Google Cloud division has gained market share from leaders Amazon (NASDAQ:AMZN) and Microsoft (NASDAQ:MSFT). A lesser-known aspect is Alphabet also directly invests in public companies through its venture arms GV and CapitalG. This portfolio ... 45% of Alphabet’s $3 Billion Hidden Portfolio Is in Just 2 White-Hot Stocks

headline: Stock Market Outlook: 2026 Will Be Another Year of Turning Lemons Into Lemonade
summary: Rising from the ashes of President Donald Trump’s Liberation Day tariffs like a phoenix, powered by tech and the artificial intelligence boom, the  is on pace for an annual gain of around 18%, with the 7000 point mark firmly in sight.  Handed a bag of lemons in the early spring, both in the form of President Trump’s hastily arranged tariff schedule, a hawkish Federal Reserve, and a shrinking U.S. economy, American companies did what they do best.

headline: Jim Cramer Slams 'Big Freakout' Selling In Nvidia, AI, Crypto Stocks After Strong GDP Print: 'It Is Just Stupid'

headline: Cloud AI Today - AI Trends Shaping Strategic Business Approaches For 2026
summary: Recent findings from a survey conducted by the Ramsey Theory Group highlight three pivotal trends in artificial intelligence (AI) that will define enterprise strategies in 2026. As AI moves from experimental phases to becoming a fundamental component of business operations, organizations are focusing on agentic AI systems with controlled autonomy, robust AI cost management, and dynamic governance models. These developments reflect a mature AI market where accountability, transparency, and...

headline: Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT) Stock Price Prediction for 2025: Where Will It Be in 1 Year
summary: Shares of Microsoft (NASDAQ:MSFT) gained 1.96% over the past five trading sessions after losing 0.03% the five prior. That brings MSFT’s year-to-date gain to 16.59%, including a nearly 38% gain since its year-to-date low on April 8.
